artist: Peter Beard; Interview by Steven M. L. Aronson; Taschen
creditline: Gift of George Slade in honor of bibliophile and scholar Christian Peterson
description: companion volume with "Peter Beard, Art Edition No. 1073"; reproductions in color of Beard's photo collages and other artwork, diaries and photographs; index of works reproduced in larger volume; soft black fabric cover with black and white photographic image of Peter Beard and embossed "PB 2"
